name: Cordial Mogan Valle

reviews.title: Great resort, apartments good value
reviews.text: Second visit with 2daughters and grandparents. 3yo daughter had a lot to entertain her with ball pit / toddler pool and even went in the big pool. Resort we love with lots of great restaurants - enoteca(pasta) and jack el negro(pizza) were best this trip.

Big Pool was cold - had to haul daughter out shivering (even in wetsuit) twice. Heard they can heat it (wish they had). Although daughter is 3 and used to warm pools - some older kids were in before the sun hit the pool so depends how cold you can cope with.
reviews.title: Excellent Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large interior bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and lounge plus double balcony - so one of the largest areas we have stayed in. Evening kids entertainment seemed better in hotel (same thing but bit inconsistent/less Carlos in apartments) was very international with lots of new song soco baci Vera, arum sum sum, chu chu ua being some of them. Daughter loved it and Carlos Caterpillar.
reviews.title: Wonderful Surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was a bit warm in the evening so we hired aircon, second week (Nov) was cooler but if you struggle with heat it's a solution.
reviews.title: Good functional appartments

reviews.text: One night a trip to the bathroom and stood on a cockroach yeuch. Apartments are clean/well designed so not sure where it came from.
reviews.title: Essex girls love Puerto de Mogan

reviews.text: Just back from a one week stay 1/11-8/11 at cordial morgan Valle appts. Really enjoyed our stay at puerto de mogan, a really lovely seaside town with some nice waterfront restaurants. The appts were great. Plus side large balcony (we had 4 sun lounges and a table with 6 chairs), 3 large pools plus baby pool with plenty of sunlounges, good breakfast buffe (recommend the omelettes made by the cook to serve), friendly staff and kids liked the activities. Downside is the stairs and lifts and pools could do with being warmed up..although our kids didn't complain. We used the spa which was nice..and my husband had a massage which he rated very highly. We had half pension but swapped some dinners for lunch so we could try some of the waterfront restaurants. The supermarket across the road was great and convenient for drinks and snacks. We did two day trips ..one by boat to Anfi beach and the other by bus (bus no 1) to Amadores beach. Had great weather the whole week and really enjoyed our stay at cordial morgan valle and Puerto de Mogan.
reviews.title: Great break in the sun!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Superb accomodation which was immaculately clean and well presented in all areas.
reviews.title: Half term heaven in Puerto de Mogan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All staff encountered were very friendly.
reviews.title: Love Mogan :-)

reviews.text: We didnt eaet in the complex -preferring to have breakfast on the huge balcony and most lunches too.We took advantage of the many restaurants by the harbour.
reviews.title: a lovely place to stay.

reviews.text: The whole holiday was great although the bar in the complex was well stocked and spacious there were few customers and little atmosphere aswell as early closing.
reviews.title: Fantastic chill out
Recommended
reviews.text: We stayed here for a week in October/November, I had read the reviews and emailed them for a high room and got the 8th floor, reception were always very friendly and helpful and a glass of wine/juice on arrival went down well. I had ordered a private transfer too and we got to the hotel easily 90 minutes quicker than the others from our aircraft. As said in other reviews the rooms are a good size very clean and balcony with shades you can adjust are good.
Only had breakfast one day but this was pleasant for the money, thesis male waiter not overly friendly but efficient, a smile wouldn't go amiss.
reviews.title: Fantastic place for families

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The free wifi great for the kids, only stayed by the infinity pool which was cold but refreshing enough. Plenty sun loungers to be had and again pool areas kept clean-in the mornings Julio was there to help with the sun beds & I suspect to stop people reserving them.
reviews.title: first rate accomadation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The resort is really nice, some great restaurants and we had breakfast most other mornings in the marina in the sun, it is busy with day trippers especially Friday in market day but it doesn't spoil it it just gives it a nice buzz, the restaurants mainly aren't pushy like in other resorts around Europe which is good.
reviews.title: Quality hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a trip out with free-motion on bikes one day which was great, they have a shop with bikes & you can book trips in the sister hotel next door, that hotel is 4 star and you can't use the facilities but it's worth a visit to see it's spectacular reception area.
reviews.title: Reasonable mass market hotel

reviews.text: It was a pleasure to be in a warm, friendly environment in a lovely situation. The rooms were comfortable and the balcony a pleasure to relax on. The swimming pools, although a little bit chilly, were very welcoming. The grounds were kept extremely well and the staff very friendly and helpful - we will return!!
reviews.title: First Stay!

reviews.text: I have just been back to Cordial Valle. This time I wished for an appartment with a view, which I got. I do not use any of the facilities at the hote. I make my own breakfast ang have lunch at one of the restaurant at the beach or I go to the fish restaurants where the fishboats are delevering their catch. Fresh and very good fish. I use the free WiFi and it works ok. I just hope that they will have aircondition installed some day. The staff at the reception desk are polite and helpfull. I will be back. Mogan is a quiet place and there are two big supermarkeds there. One across from the hotel and Spar closer to the beach. Both very good.
reviews.title: Still a great appartment hotel ti visit

reviews.text: Great stay, 10-24 October.
reviews.title: Worth it for the balcony alone!

reviews.text: Previously stayed at the wonderful playa mogan next door, but the size of the private balconies drew us to self catering for the first time. Not disappointed! It was great to be able to totally relax in peace & quiet.
reviews.title: Very good for families, efficient service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not a long walk to harbour area & some really great restaurants (Taj tandoori on top floor of shopping centre opposite & Calima Italian restaurant lounge overlooking the beach) our particular favourites!
reviews.title: Excellent rooms and pools. Very good value

aka: Cordial Mogan Valle Hotel Puerto De Mogan
description: In Puerto de Mogán, a fishermen area known as “Little Venice” by its visitors, just a few metres from the beach and from the colourful fishing quay and the marina, all surrounded by the beautiful and exuberant Mogán Valley. 303 luxurious and broad apartments of one or two bedrooms covering a total surface of 35.000 squared metres with subtropical garden adjacent to Hotel Cordial Mogán Playa.All the apartments have a living-room with kitchenette (microwave, coffee-machine, fridge, toaster, kettle), safe (for rent), satellite TV, direct telephone, bathroom and furnished terrace with private shower. There are ceiling fans in living- and bedroom.Half board including buffet breakfast and dinner with the possibility of having lunch instead of dinner.
